questions.question: The primary purpose of an audit is to:
options: Express an opinion on financial statements

correct.text: An audit provides an opinion on the fairness of financial statements.

incorrect.A: Auditors are not responsible for detecting all fraud.
incorrect.C: Tax preparation is not an audit objective.

questions.question: Which audit opinion is issued when financial statements are fairly presented?

correct.text: An unqualified opinion indicates fair presentation.
